basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Cheryl B. Frech Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry

description: This scholarship honors retired faculty member Dr. Cheryl Frech, who enthusiastically encouraged many students to pursue an education in Chemistry. This scholarship will provide assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science who are pursuing a degree in the Department of Chemistry and are active in Chemistry Club. The recipient(s) of the Dr. Cheryl B. Frech Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry will be selected by committee appointed by the Dean of the College of Mathematics and Science and will include representatives from the Department of Chemistry. The recipient(s) will be selected in the spring for distribution the following fall and/or spring semesters. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Must be enrolled full-time Minimum of 2.5 GPA Must be a Chemistry major Preference will be given to a student who is active in Chemistry Club

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
